title: Disk Genius 3.0 Eng Version (updated to 3.2 final )

forumNotes.author: maanu
forumNotes.content:
I am attaching/giving a link to UNTOUCHED copy which i downloaded a while back, version 3.0 Beta 12, from their Home page (Now Lost) . It is clearly mentioned in License that for non-commercial purposes this tool can be redistributed and used as long as it is Untouched Unmodified. One of the Authors of the app, **Dgen** , has kindly responded on my request that he ll make an english version of latest and final v 3.2 .both windows and dos. At the moment he is still in the debugging phase, so he said that it is going to take a while. The file is easy available on Chinese sites as DGen301206.rar, however sometimes it is difficult for non-Chinese to find the actual download link on the page.
As soon as I'll have news from **Dgen** I will let you know/update. some features. 1. it can make your usb bootable with free dos ( 3 methods) . 2. it can clone your hdd and individual partitions. 3. it can partition a sata/ide hdd. 4. it gives you low level access to your hdd's and USB's along to multi partitions of a usb drive **without** installing any additional driver like dummydisk . and many others in such a small size . a dos version is also included . just call the exe at dos level and it ll run all right., here is the link . ``` http://ifile.it/k73amei ```
Enjoy :wink:

forumNotes.author: maanu
forumNotes.content:
Last night **Dgen** finally sent me Latest version of Disk Genius :wink: ![:rolleyes:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/rolleyes.gif) .
i was bugging him for the last 2 months to get this version :wink: . and i finally succeeded . but as of now it is just a windows version . he said , he will publish the Dos version in one month . however this windows version is **Limited-Time trial** version with full features . he said this version will expire on **7th month of 2010** . he said that Retail price is not yet set . he allowed me to share this version with anyone . it is nowhere available now , not even on their site . i am privileged to introduce the new version in english language exclusively on Boot-Land. ![Posted Image](http://i50.tinypic.com/wsk01e.jpg) ![Posted Image](http://i45.tinypic.com/20fstn8.jpg) ![Posted Image](http://i46.tinypic.com/34edmjt.jpg) ![Posted Image](http://i45.tinypic.com/23s9e2g.jpg) **DGen321211en.7z** [http://ifile.it/ctbkqlv](http://ifile.it/ctbkqlv "External link")

forumNotes.content:

just compare it by having some points ,   

1. compare its vast options  
2. its Genuine stand alone quality ( portable by default)  
3. easy to use.
